name: The Fourth Seal
description:
FiveTailedGames Presents: The Fourth Seal

Corruption has swept over the land, consuming and changing every lifeform. Osin, a man half transformed by the corruption, journeys into the rock caves in search of a cure for his ailment, the Fountain of Life. What lurks in the belly of the cave may not be what he expected.

Controls:

WASD: Movement     Space: Jump      Mouse: Select cards

Project Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/TailedFive

Team:

Nathainel Greiner - Programmer, Sound Designer

Emmanuel Atilola - UX/UI Designer, Social Media Manager

Em Barry - 3D Artist

Hunter Shields - Programmer

Chris Owens - Programmer

Flythrough Video - An abbreviated journey!

Soundscape - A bass layer of fear.

Narration - A Call to Action.
